title: Gun x Sword
synopsis: Join Van and Wendy on a bunch of random, wacky adventures as they travel the planet of Endless Illusion.

title: Damasaretemo Suki na Hito

synonyms: The Person Who Likes it, Even if He's Deceived
alternative_titles.ja: だまされても好きなひと

synopsis:
Teacher/Student relationship - The teacher has a bad memory from his past, so he doesn't believe his student's confession.

(Source: MU)

title: Hana ni te Sourou
synopsis:
Collection of tales of love between warriors. Good, solid artwork, if not the best available. Plenty of hard yaoi to go around here, too, if that's your bag. If samurai themes appeal to you, this manga probably will, too.

(Source: MU)

title: Keikoku no Shitateya Rose Bertin

alternative_titles.en: Rose Bertin: The Dressmaker That Launched a Thousand Dreams
alternative_titles.ja: 傾国の仕立て屋 ローズ・ベルタン

synopsis:
18th century France, just before the revolution. The palace of Versailles hosted a dressmaker with more style than even the nobles themselves. This is the story of Rose Bertin, the mother of fashion design and the favorite stylist of Marie Antoinette.

(Source: Shinchosha, translated)

title: Mokka, Mimodaeshi Mune no Uchi.
synopsis:
• Meshita Mimodaeshi Mune no Uchi
Gen was lying bruised and bloodied on the sidewalk when Kiba found him. The two became friends after that. One day Gen was surprised to find out the girl he was sleeping with was Kiba's ex, but hearing about his friend became an obsession as Gen picked up more and more of Kiba's "leftovers"...

• Mokka, Mimodaeshi Mune no Uchi  

Source: MangaUpdates

title: Koi wa Tsuzuku yo Doko Made mo Bangai-hen

synonyms: An Incurable Case of Love Extra Edition
alternative_titles.ja: 恋はつづくよどこまでも番外編

title: Ikki Yakou
synopsis:
Five years after the Tokugawa shogunate collapsed. Kizou is the dour, misanthropic owner of a used-goods store. One night, out of the blue, the demon Koharu wanders into his house, having gotten separated from his group of wandering spirits. Koharu impudently assumes he can stay there for free, and Kizou unwillingly relents. The two of them wind up getting involved in the affairs of various spirits... A story of empathy among spirits during the Meiji era that will move you with kindness.

(Source: Square Enix, translated)

title: Kotoba no Nai Love Letter

alternative_titles.ja: 言葉のないラブレター

synopsis:
She met him on her trip to Taiwan. They really liked each other and had tried every efforts to keep their relationship. However, language difference and time difference had shattered their hope. Two years later, she was on her trip to Taiwan again, with love and hope...and then she found out that he was engaged.

(Source: MegKF)

title: Koi no Iro
synopsis:
Nao is a high-school student with a secret he carefully hides from everybody: He’s fallen in love with his close friend, Hira. One day, Hira tells Nao that he looks different lately. Now Nao is terrified that Hira might have noticed his feelings! Or could it be that he’s just over-reacting and his friend hasn’t noticed anything at all?

(Source: DMP)

title: Goshujinsama no Ore?
synopsis: When Nobuhiro's father dies the college student is left with a lot of debt. The only way for him to work it off is too move in with his uncle and tutor his cousin Suguru, a illness-prone high schooler. (Source: M-U)

alternative_titles.ja: すてきに!ドリームステージ

title: Kamen Rider Buster
synopsis: In the first chapter, Ryo Ogami is an old-fashioned but powerful brawler living a high school life, alongside his childhood friend and student council president Haruka Kiritani, who he is in love with. One day when buying his favorite soda from a vending machine, he finds a mysterious item under it, a Wonder Ride Book by the name of "Genbu Shinwa"...

title: Sayonara Ponytail no Houkago Lesson

alternative_titles.ja: さよならポニーテールの放課後れっすん

synopsis: A slice of life series following the everyday adventures of classmates Miina, Nacchan, Ayumin, Yuyu, and Shuka.

title: Break It
synopsis:
A mysterious man, Hosumi, who suddenly appeared when Satsuki, a rural high school student, is in the middle of beating up some local punks.

He's terrified but he obeys Hosumi's orders since he's strong than Satsuki. He can't help but follow the mysterious man. And he even took Satsuki to his home!!? Despite being questioned, he can't keep up with the situation. He doesn't understand what's happening right now. Who on earth is this guy...? Moreover, Hosumi was a police officer.

A heartwarming but slightly dark story of a shy high school student and a mysterious police officer unfolding in a rural area.

(Source: Renta!, edited)

title: Nayameru Hime to Mayoeru Ouji

alternative_titles.ja: 悩める姫と迷える王子

synopsis:
High school student, Oikawa Miwa, has her first boyfriend! He is an older guy that works at an appliance store, but does he really love her or is she too young for him to take seriously?

(Source: Shoujo Addiction)

title: Tama yori Hayaku!!
synopsis: Nakajima Hayato, a 23-year old new hire of a highly selective elite group of officers from the Tokyo police department, has just arrived at a smaller Kanagawa police branch to fulfill a 9 month training requirement.  He is partnered with Kashitani Akihiko, an older officer who rose to the same rank as Hayato, but through hard work and experience in the field.  With nearly opposite backgrounds and opposite personalities, how will these two be able to solve the numerous cases that will confront them?

title: Yeohye
synopsis:
Amidst the hidden truth and love-hate, the romance of the heartbreaking historical drama of those who only cross each other.

(Source: MU)

title: Hakushaku-ke no Akusai
synopsis:
The marriage arrangement introduced to the duke's daughter, Hermina, had been to the rumored worst playboy in high society, the earl's son, Erich. Hermina, who accepted the offer, sends him a letter with conditions for their married life. The letter has nothing but unreasonable demands, but Erich says that he's happy and that he's looking forward to their married life...?!

"I'll become Hermina-sama's dog or manservant for the rest of my life." ...What is this guy saying?!

Isn't this just fluff between a beautiful intense wife and a con-man husband? A newlywed love comedy.

(Source: Shousetsuka ni Narou, translated)

2. Honeycomb Child

title: Kimi to Dakara, Zenbu Shitai. Ai de Tagari Kare no Amai Yokkyuu

alternative_titles.ja: キミとだから、ぜんぶシたい。 愛でたがり彼の甘い欲求

synopsis:
Konami Satsuki is an office lady who is insecure about her large breasts and tends to slouch. She hides a secret from her fellow female coworkers. She's dating her superior who is popular with everyone, Sudou. Both of them share a similarity, their fondness for a mascot, and start dating. But until now, the furthest they've gone is just kissing. Being the gentleman he is, Sudou patiently waits for her to consent to taking the next step. But because of certain circumstances, they get into a disagreement. Satsuki tries to get away, but Sudou wants to love her wholeheartedly....

(Source: Batoto Scans)

title: Roku to Rui
synopsis:
Rui Takanashi dreams of a wonderful campus life. One day, the girl he's interested in calls him to meet to confess her feelings! Cheerfully heading there, all Rui finds is his childhood friend, Roku Koga. Looking back, Roku has kept on interfering with Rui's important moments. Like stealing the girl Rui liked or kissing him just to mess around... When Rui finally couldn't take it any longer, the only thing Roku said was just these unexpected words: "But I'm the one who likes you longer, Rui."

"I never knew this side of my childhood friend!!" The exciting love life of Roku, who can’t be honest at all, and Rui, who is a beginner in love, starts now!

(Source: Libre, translated)

title: Karuizawa Syndrome
synopsis: Slice of life manga about a young photographer and the many women who love him.

title: Kyou no Jugyou wa Renai desu!

alternative_titles.ja: 今日の授業は恋愛です！

title: Hetare to Bakatare
synopsis:
Yoshiro has had hidden, unrequited feelings for his childhood friend, Dai, for several years. He constantly turns down cute girls when they ask him out. Oblivious to Yoshiro's feelings, Dai envies Yoshiro's popularity with girls, and always makes a fuss about wanting a girlfriend. Yoshiro has no intention of ever telling his airheaded friend the truth and resigns himself to a life of fluxing between appreciation for their friendship and sorrow that they can't be more. That is, until one day when the two are invited to a mixer, where Yoshiro somehow ends up dragging Dai to a motel and tries pushing him down on the bed...! This is a tantalizing love story about how a loser with unrequited feelings and his airheaded childhood friend become a couple.

(Source: Renta!)

title: Mikata ga Yowa Sugite Hojo Mahou ni Toushite Ita Kyuutei Mahoushi, Tsuihou Sarete Saikyou wo Mezasu

alternative_titles.ja: 味方が弱すぎて補助魔法に徹していた宮廷魔法師、追放されて最強を目指す

title: Story 311
synopsis:
The manga anthology is created as part of charity with royalties donated for reconstruction of areas affected by the Great Eastern Japan Earthquake (Higashi Nihon Daishinsai) disaster that struck Japan on March 11, 2011.

(Source: M-U)

title: Hitotsuki no Koibito
synopsis:
When a Plain Jane...

Efficient, witty and prim Miranda Fairchild has always blended into the background – her two beautiful sisters have seen to that! But that hasn’t stopped Miranda secretly dreaming of finding her fairy-tale prince...

...is hired by a charming playboy...

Dangerously charismatic, celebrity Rafe Knighton does not fit the bill. So when Miranda is hired as his assistant, she’s shocked to learn that Rafe has hidden depths.

...can there be a Happy Ever After?

And there’s more to Miranda than meets the eye – as Rafe knows all too well! Will he give this stubborn Cinderella the diamond ring she deserves?

(Source: M-U)

title: Berry Ecstasy
synopsis:
Contains 2 stories:

- Berry Ecstasy (Chapters 1-5)
When Shinya meets his friend Toshiaki's girlfriend by chance and suspects she isn't being treated well, he decides she's in need of rescue. But Misa's character is complex and a relationship with her will be more difficult than Shinya could have imagined.

- The Way of the Beast (Chapters 6-8)

(Source: B-U Manga)

title: Hajimete no Chuu Ijou

alternative_titles.ja: はじめてのチュウ以上

synopsis:
The young Saori-chan visits her cousin, asking about sex nervously after just learning that her friends had done it.

(Source: MU)

title: Shun-chan Kocchi Muite!

alternative_titles.ja: 竣ちゃんこっちむいて!

synopsis:
Athletic. Academic. Handsome. "This guy is flawless, but he likes me so much he could cry." Shun and Haruto are best friends who have been together from childhood. However, Haruto, who has been in love with Shun for a long time ago, is, as Shun says, a troublesome guy who shows his affection to the person he likes regardless of where they are... Despite saying that, Shun also loves Haruto and began to have perverted dreams about him frequently. At the height of his puberty, Shun couldn't be honest and acted hot and cold every day until, one day, he mistook the real Haruto for the one in his dreams and kissed him...?!

This is a BL about a youth full of worldly desires!

(Source: Sankosha, translated)

title: Manhattan Love Story dj - Meet Me in Cotton Roses

alternative_titles.ja: コットンローズで逢いましょう

synopsis:
Pairing: Jesse x Louis
What should Jesse do when Louis gets jealous? And what does "like a face of a Cotton Rose" mean?

(Source: Attractive Fascinante)

title: Isso kore wo unmei to yobe

alternative_titles.ja: いっそこれを運命と呼べ

title: Tropical Hanjirou
synopsis:
Hanjirou is a 23 year old math teacher—young, handsome, cool.. and a sadist.  His teaching methods are surprisingly violent and he's armed with a whip and knives that are regularly put to use.  But has Hanjirou met his match in the form of two students—the love-struck, odd Umi and the calm, collected Torosu?

Included one-shots:
Volume 1: Akai Chapeau
Volume 2: Lemon Kajitta?
Volume 3: Lemon Kanjichau

synonyms: Otome Road to Shitsuji to Tobira
alternative_titles.ja: GRACE DOOR 執事と罪; GRACE DOOR 乙女ロードと執事と扉

title: Shindemo Oshimasu!!: Jinsei Nidome no Koushaku Reijou, Kondo wa Dansou Kishi ni Natte Saioshi Konyakusha wo Osukui shimasu

alternative_titles.ja: 死んでも推します!! ~人生二度目の公爵令嬢、今度は男装騎士になって最推し婚約者をお救いします~

synopsis:
Serena is a duke's daughter who is engaged to Finis, the head of the empire's pride, the Black Wolves Knights Order. Ever since she first saw his portrait, she became infatuated with him and has been fangirling over him with feverish fervor. But just when their wedding day was close, the two of them were suddenly killed by someone.

By the time she realizes it, her "second life" had already started with memories of her past life still in tact. Determined not to let Finis die this time, Serena joined the knights order so she can protect her number one bias, Finis as a knight herself!

(Source: Kodansha, translated)

title: Shiroiro to Kuroiro Kagisora Tomiyaki Shoki Sakuhin

alternative_titles.en: White and Black, Tomiyaki Kagisora's Early Works
alternative_titles.ja: しろいろとくろいろ 鍵空とみやき初期作品

title: Kyou, Furyou wo Hirou

alternative_titles.en: Today, I Took Care of a Bad Boy.

synopsis:
A handsome boy who had run away from his home appeared in front of college student Tsumugi's apartment. Tsumugi was intrigued by that boy who called himself Beni and who's a relative of the man who once killed his father. What will happen next...?

"I regret it to death, I wish I'd never asked him to stay the night."

(Source: Kadokawa, translated)

title: Daisuki Daisuki
synopsis: Contains 9 oneshots pertaining to love and friendship. (B-U)

title: Ouma ga Blue

alternative_titles.ja: 逢魔ヶＢＬＵＥ; おうまがブルー

synopsis:
Twilight is the time for the demon. A tribe that has been forgotten for a long time is slowly make some movement in today world.... 

Marie heard a cat meowing, when she follows the voice, this events leads her to a chain of events that will forever change her life.

title: Tane wo Maku Hito
synopsis:
Minami fell in love with the beautiful but aloof dentist Kitagami, but was summarily rejected—Kitagami just doesn't date. An undeterred Minami continues his advances, determined to get Kitagami to take his feelings seriously. But whilst Kitagami continuously fights off Minami's advances, his meddling twin sister Hana and the artful lawyer Itoda seem to be working on Minami's side!

To Sow A Seed is a heart-warming and funny story about love and pain. The key to Kitagami's cold, aloof heart lies in understanding his painful past, but will Minami realise the truth about love and relationships in time to salvage his efforts at building a relationship with Kitagami?

(Source: DMG)

title: Sakura Comic
synopsis: Bonus manga included with Sakura Trick anime bluray.

title: Michizure Encore
synopsis:
"Pamper me! Right! Now!" On his way home from work, Tatemaru comes across his high school senpai, Yukihito Miyama. He's supposed to be this super perfect and talented person, but he's here in his house, lazing around, acting selfish. Seeing Miyama reveal a weaker side of himself to him, Tatemaru can't bring himself to kick Miyama out. Thus begins their domestic life together.

(Source: Tokyo Mangasha, translated)

title: Gakusei Kekkon Shita Aite wa Bukiyou Kawaii Yuuboku Minzoku no Hime Deshita

alternative_titles.ja: 学生結婚した相手は不器用カワイイ遊牧民族の姫でした

synopsis:
Due to certain circumstances, Toru Shida is getting married in his first year of high school.
The bride is Meiyue, an exotic beauty he had just met.
She is clumsy and a bit bossy, but she is also the princess of a nomadic tribe.......?
The two people, from different nationalities and backgrounds, felt distant at first. But as they go to high school together and live together under the same roof, they gradually come to terms with each other...

(Source: Overlap, translated)

title: Excite Love Joutou!

alternative_titles.ja: エキサイト LOVE 上等!

synopsis:
"I really want to become Rui’s protector!" Super introvert Souichirou frequently says this. However, whenever he listens to "Rocky"´s song, he immediately has a 180° change in his character (pervert)! Rui, who is always surrounded by guys who only care about a girl's figure and looks, wishes to meet a true prince one day, but sadly most are...? Would prevail love this time also...?!

(Source: Shoujo Crusade)

Included one-shots: Irogonomi na Kareshi no Jouken, Dream

title: Behind Master
synopsis:
There's an old legend that a monk and a Tengu (Heaven Dog - 天狗) is rival. Kiyomi is a monk who was saved by a girl named Sasuka. While staying there, he found out that there were girls who went missing. Villagers think the culprit is a Tengu. Is the Tengu really culprit? And somehow it seems that Sasuka relates with Tengu. And somehow Kiyomi is just a fake monk?

(Source: MU)

title: Toshisan: Toshi Densetsu Tokushu Sousa Honbu Dai San Ka

title: Don't Cry Baby

alternative_titles.ja: ドント・クライ・ベイビィ

synopsis:
Takarai was demoted and started dealing with vets. A simple teasing caused Toudou-sensei to take special care of him. Toudou-sensei saw through Takarai's wounds and hoped that Takarai could accept his confession. Could Takarai let go of his sad past?

(Source: Attractive Fascinante)

alternative_titles.ja: アソコのプロジェクト

synonyms: How to Grow a Sweet Bud
alternative_titles.ja: あまいつぼみのそだてかた

title: Ore ga Sekiyuou to Koi ni Ochitara

synonyms: Doujin Sakka ga Sekiyuou to Koi ni Ochitara
alternative_titles.en: If I Fall in Love With an Oil King.
alternative_titles.ja: 同人作家〈おれ〉が石油王と恋に落ちたら

title: Heroic Complex

alternative_titles.ja: ヒロイック・コンプレックス

synopsis: A romantic comedy about a high school boy who can transform into a magical girl and a high school girl who can transform into a super warrior.

title: Junai nante Shiranee wa

alternative_titles.en: I Don't Give a Damn About Pure Love
alternative_titles.ja: 純愛なんてしらねーわ

synopsis:
Ren's only into one thing: guys with huge... assets. In his quest to find the perfect partner, he's even turned to working as a male escort in addition to his day job. But, there's one thing stopping him from enjoying true intimacy... he's incredibly sensitive, and even the slightest touch makes him moan. In a horrifying turn of events, he's "accidentally" hired by Sakura, the new guy at work who looks like a total player despite protests that he's never slept with anyone. But, when Ren unzips his pants, he find the largest junk he's ever seen on a guy! A workplace romantic comedy between an egomaniac and his puppy-like junior coworker who'll do anything to please him.

(Source: Renta!)

title: Street Workout
synopsis:
Baek Dong-hee, a high school student who once pursued his dream of being the best b-boy in the world, but he lost his dreams and hopes due to an accident. One day, he meets Kwon Jin-i, a girl who works out with a bare body, and his life, which had stopped, begins to move again.

(Source: MU)

title: Kemono no Kuni no Harami Hime
Dekiai Engage: 12-sai Toshiue no Ojisama to

alternative_titles.en: Lovey-Dovey Engagement: My Fiance is 12 Years Older
alternative_titles.ja: 溺愛エンゲージ～12歳年上のオジサマと～

synopsis:
"Koharu, you've had a fiance since you were born..." This is what my grandfather confesses to me one day out of the blue. But how could I, a 25-year-old stranger to love, possibly have a fiance? And on top of that, instead of living by myself while my grandfather is in the hospital, I have to live with him instead...?! He's tall, handsome, wealthy, and a CEO... not to mention 12 years my senior! We've got nothing in common! But his kindness and his unexpected naivete touch my heart, and before I know it...?! Between our short-term cohabitation and an marriage pact made by our grandfathers, this is one romance we can't let anyone find out about...

(Source: NTT Solmare Corporation)

title: Akazukin-chan ga Zukin wo Nuida you desu

synonyms: Little Red Riding Hood Is Hoodless
It Seems Little Red Riding Hood has Taken Off Her Hood
alternative_titles.ja: 赤ずきんちゃんがずきんを脱いだようです

synopsis:
In this unconventional retelling of Little Red Riding Hood, Little Red is just the sort of girl who figures hoods are out of fashion. So obviously she takes it off. Like any other bratty little girl, she groans when Mom tells her to visit Grandma who is sick in bed. But of course since there's pocket money involved she can't possibly refuse! Little did she know that she would meet Mr. Mole, Mr. Hunter and of course the Big Bad Wolf. Will Little Red Riding's carefree attitude cause her demise, or will things turn out any different from the traditional fairy tale?
(Source: demiotaku).

title: Ame ga Shinai Koto
synopsis:
What do we know about Ame...?
That she suddenly moved to a small, old, one-story house in the suburbs. That she keeps cooking the same dishes whens he starts to get picky. And that Ame never falls in love. She's a little different from everyone else, but they are just strange as her.

(Sourse: MU)

title: SM Girls: Saber Marionette R

alternative_titles.ja: SMガールズ　セイバーマリオネットR

synopsis:
Jr., the heir of Romana and his battle sabers Cherry and Lime, who have girl circuits are enjoying their peaceful life in Romana. Suddenly, the evil Star-Face and his sexadolls attack Romana in order to take over so Star-Face can become the next High Official. In order to truly become the next High Official and ruler of Romana, he must first eliminate Jr. This begins a battle for, not only Jr.'s life, but for all of Romana.

(Source: ANN)

title: Kagi ga Nai
synopsis: Kikuchi, a salaryman, lost his key and wallet and can't go home tonight.

title: Big Boss Gone Bad
synopsis:
Woo Soo-han is what you would call the “complete package.” He’s young, physically fit, handsome, and has flourishing career to boot. He’s got everything anyone could ever desire, except maybe a relationship. That never bothered him, as work has always been his main priority. Everything changes when he meets his close hyung (and work subordinate)’s wife, Nayoung. From the moment he laid eyes on her, he felt an inexplicable attraction. Soo-han knew it was wrong and tried to forget about her, but when the two cross paths at a night club, and he ends up taking an intoxicated Nayoung back to her house. After discovering her husband isn’t home, Soo-han finds that he is no longer able to control his urges…

Source: Lezhin

alternative_titles.ja: ヨッシーストーリー4コママンガ劇場

title: Dallyeola Hani
synopsis: Hani, who lost her mother from illness as a child, is an orphan living alone. Following her passing, Hani's father found another woman and leaves the house filled with the memories of Hani's mother. Hani, feeling betrayed, turns to her strength, running.

title: Inokori Suzume no Enmusubi Ayakashi-tachi no Omoi Nokoshi, Suzume no Shoujo to Okatazuke

alternative_titles.ja: 居残りすずめの縁結び あやかしたちの想い遺し、すずめの少女とお片付け

alternative_titles.ja: 超日常の少女群 ユエミチタカ作品集

2. Gyakugire Shuriken
3-6. Chounouryoku ga Hitsuyou
7. Tonari no Venus
8-10. Messialon
11. Seishun Reconquista
12. Shukatsu Zanmai

title: A Handsome Swordsman
synopsis:
Moosung is an inn server with a huge crush on Soyeon, a beautiful woman from an influential family. Unfortunately, she's only willing to marry... a very handsome swordsman. Now Moosung's life mission is to become the best (and most handsome) martial artist in the world and win over Soyeon's heart. So he starts training hard, but it's not until he reads a book of secret martial arts skills that his true potential is magically unlocked. Can Moosung become a great martial artist, or will someone else swoop in and steal the love of his life?

(Source: Tapas Media)

alternative_titles.ja: その恋、騙されていませんか?

title: My Guardian Demon
synopsis:
Sowon Han is awoken one night by a kiss—but waiting for her is no fairytale prince! Her visitor is a mysterious demon who quickly vanishes after Sowon wakes. Was it all just a dream? When Sowon goes to school the next day, she is shocked to meet her newest classmate: Hyeon Yu, the demon who kissed her and declared himself her guardian! Hyeon is determined to rekindle their millennium-old forbidden love, but Sowon has no idea what he's talking about. Will she ever remember Hyeon and their romance? Or is Hyeon destined to remain true to his demon roots and walk a darker path?

(Source: Webtoon Entertainment)

title: Toshishita Joushi no Utamaro-sama Dekkai Kare wo Uketomemasu!!

title: Alice to Amaryllis
synopsis:
Alice Kinari is a fifth-grade student leading an ordinary but pleasant life with her loving parents. While Alice's parents had an unconventional beginning, they now have a picture-perfect romance that Alice admires immensely. She also has many friends at school and even a budding crush on her classmate Riichi Akanazaka. Nothing seems to be amiss until one day, Alice's father leaves for a business trip in Kansai and never returns.

Instead of Alice's father, loan sharks appear, searching for her father and demanding payment for the debt he had acquired. Confused and afraid, Alice's mother forces them to escape from the sharks. As her mother files for divorce and transitions into working multiple jobs to keep the two of them afloat, Alice transfers to a new school and starts her life over as Alice Azamino.

Being unable to say goodbye to her old friends and getting ostracized by her new classmates makes Alice feel lonelier than ever. But when another unexpected surprise comes her way, Alice wonders if she will ever be able to return to the average life she once knew.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

Shino is only a fifth grade elementary school student. As a first year university student, I am also Shino's childhood friend. Despite hating green peas, she is a well-behaved, trouble-free child. That being said, there is a part of her that worries me. She is interested in novelty and abnormal events. I'd rather see Shino behaving self-willingly, my only wish is to see her become an ordinary elementary school student. However without taking my worries into account, she tries to solve the dangerous mysteries all by herself. The beginning of a pure love mystery tale!

One day while walking home from school, he finds that someone has messed with his trash. His trash has been left behind because the different types of trash were mixed up. The perpetrator kept mixing up only Souya's trash everyday, so one day Souya decides to lie and wait to catch this annoying criminal. That day, he finds that the perpetrator was actually the recently transferred classmate, Tokisaka Koyomi, and she reveals that she has come from the future to stop all environmentally friendly activity. Now, Souya and Tokisaka will have to live together and destroy the environment so that Tokisaka can go back to the future.

With an early start to her education, she makes it her goal in this life to become a government employee—everyone knows they get the best benefits, after all. Unfortunately, her diligent studies are interrupted by the appearance of Kiershka Reinfont, the son of the grand duke. Despite his angelic face, he's a rotten bully with the manners of a devil, and worst of all, he's taken an interest in Arendine. With her new life at stake, Arendine will do whatever it takes to make sure this new "friend" doesn't mess things up!

title: Kotonoha
synopsis:
This is a series of 4 one-shots by Asou Mikoto that all have a common theme of words and language.

Kotonoha ~Usuyou no Tsukebumi~ :
Maeda Kotoha joined the calligraphy club at her highschool b/c she was impressed by the club president Fujisaki's demonstration.  Unable to gather up her courage to confess her feelings, he graduates.  Feeling regret, Kotoha decides to write him a letter using a brush and traditional paper...

Kotonoha ~Ningyohime no Kowairo~ :
Manabe, a cool ice queen type of girl, in Fukazawa Tatsuhiro's class joins the swim team even though she can't swim.  Intrigued, Fukazawa decides to teach her, but wonders why she wants to learn so badly...

Kotonoha ~Tenjousajiki no Naishobanashi~ :
Mihara Ritsu is a playwright for her school's drama club.  Nakajima is an underclassmen who joins the club because he was moved by the lead actress Seto Miyabi's words in the final scene of last year's production.  This year, Ritsu must write a play that stars both of them, but as usual, writing does not happen easily...

Kotonoha ~Shijin no Koi~ :
It all started when Sako accidentally picked up Kumazawa's book of poetry and secretly read what she wrote.  A lot of it was humorous, but some poems were serious, particularly the ones that poignantly expressed her feelings about a certain classmate...

His curiosity is piqued when he sees Kadri stubbornly refusing to move out and suddenly suggests settling matters through a particular process. Rather than upset Grandma Jedda, Kadri decides to take on the challenge. He goes to the prince's palace with no bedroom experience to speak of and discovers pleasure for the first time in his life.

Oh, and the greatest fighter in this place also happens to be the Demon Lord who is kidnapping people all across the kingdom in an attempt to wipe out humanity? Even better! synopsis:
A loved one died. Momo, a high school student who lost her best friend Sayo, who had been with her since elementary school, in a sudden accident.

In despair, she reunites with Sayo's younger brother, Keichiro, at the funeral for the first time in eight years. The secret base in the residential area, the ferris wheel dyed in twilight, and a candy shop they frequently visited. Momo and Keichiro trace the places from their memories as if to regain the fun memories of their childhood. Looking for the view of summer which was supposed to be spent with her best friend, his sister Sayo. A heartrending blue summer graffiti spun by the boys and girls who lost their loved ones.

Two people who are stagnated in their lives meet, and their lives move.

(Source: Shodensha, translated)

title: Night Bus
synopsis:
In Night Bus, a young woman wearing round glasses finds herself on an adventurous late night bus ride that constantly makes detours through increasingly fantastical landscapes. Meanwhile a young cartoonist returns home after art school and tries his hand at becoming a working artist while watching over his aging grandmother whose memory is deteriorating. Nostalgic leaps take us to an elementary school gymnasium that slowly morphs into a swamp and is raided by a giant catfish. Beetles, salamanders, and bug-eyed fish intrude upon the bus ride of the round-glasses woman as the night stretches on. Night Bus blends autobiography, horror, and fantasy into a vibrantly detailed surreal world that shows a distinct talent surveying his past.

Nature infringes upon the man-made world via gigantism and explosive abundance–the images in Night Bus are often unsettling, not aimed to horrify, but to upset the balance of modern life.
(Drawn and Quarterly)

And then, just as Chikage gets her first shot at filming a made-for-TV movie, it turns out that Hiroto will be her costar... "Oh sorry... I'm very sleepy because of my period."

Erika, who fell in love there, doesn't hide her feelings of "love".

title: Yuugure e
synopsis:
Offshore Lightning collects Saito s early work as well as these two recent graphic novellas. Stories like Buy Dog Food and Go Home and Offshore Lightning focus on middle-aged men caught in a cycle of self pity and self reflection. Saito gently pokes fun at their anguish and self-involvement while capturing the pathos of these men as they revisit childhood friendships and lost loves. By contrast, In Captivity follows three siblings visiting their ailing mother who is succumbing to dementia and resentful at her loss of agency. The siblings take a drive as they reckon with balancing the painful legacy of her caustic personality with attempting to honor this woman at the end of her life. Solitary Death Building documents an eccentric cast of elderly gossips as death descends upon the housing complex where they all live.

title: Double Decker! Doug & Kirill
synopsis:
The once peaceful city-state of Lisvalletta has found itself beset by a dangerous new drug called Anthem. The side effects of the drug allow the user to enter a state of Overdrive, wherein they mutate into superpowered beasts with inhuman abilities. With the police powerless to stop this new threat, the responsibility falls upon the Special Crime Investigation Unit SEVEN-O. To offset the dangers of this work, the investigators work under the patented "Double Decker" system, which requires them to team up in "buddy cop" pairs.

As a child, average police officer Kirill Vrubel fantasized about being a hero who would save his school from a random terrorist attack. His chance to be a hero arrives when his landlady blackmails him into searching for her lost cat. Upon arriving and falling asleep in an abandoned warehouse, Kirill finds himself in the middle of a hostage situation involving an Anthem user. By teaming up with SEVEN-O detective Douglas "Doug" Bilingam, Kirill earns his spot as the newest member of SEVEN-O. Now, with the help of this secret organization, he may finally achieve his dream of becoming a hero.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
